title: A U Xue Kexue
synopsis: This film is an extension of the "A You" animation series, adapted from the "Science Literacy Reader for Primary School Students" published by Science Popularization Publishing House. It presents popular science knowledge to the audience with a humorous storyline, so that children can learn to think like a scientist . A group of children, mainly U, are curious about nature and social life, and they are actively exploring. Through the answers of teachers and parents, they have learned a lot of interesting scientific knowledge. The whole film is humorous and funny without losing a rigorous scientific attitude, allowing children to learn knowledge in laughter and truly entertaining. (translated from youku)
